name: DROPSHIP
description:
DROPSHIP is a challenging new twist on a classic formula. A skill based game that will test your patience and determination, DROPSHIP was designed to be hard as nails and unforgiving. Can you keep your cool and make it to the end?

GAMEPLAY


  • Navigate through dangerous environments
  • Conserve fuel and bend gravity to your will
  • Drop to the landing pad
  • Don't blow up your ship in the process
  • Repeat

FEATURES


  • 40 increasingly tense levels
  • Leaderboards to test your times against other pilots
  • Practice mode for new recruits
  • Hardcore mode; limited lives and high scores. How far can you get?
  • Potentially rage inducing, skill based gameplay
  • A vibrant and eye catching visual style
